query.statement:
SELECT A.CS124_UPN AS UPN ,A.CS124_CST AS CST ,A.CS124_SEQ AS SEQ ,A.CS124_COL AS COL ,B.CTEXT2 AS COL_NM ,A.CS124_OLD AS OLD ,A.CS124_NEW AS NEW ,A.CS124_MDT AS MDT ,A.CS124_MTM AS MTM ,A.CS124_MID AS MID ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND USERNUMB = A.CS124_MID) AS MID_NM ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST124 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CS124_UPN = A.CS124_UPN AND CS124_CST = A.CS124_CST)||' °Ç' AS CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST124 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.LANG = 'ko' AND B.CODE1 = 'CS202' AND B.CODE2 = A.CS124_COL WHERE A.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND A.CS124_UPN = #UPN# AND A.CS124_CST = #CST#
ORDER BY A.CS124_UPN, A.CS124_CST, A.CS124_SEQ DESC
FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
WITH UR
